messages.message: doing great.  your turn worked out reasonably well.  thank you for keeping the territory neutral.  Is there anything we can currently work on together or should we continue to keep neutral for now?

My only concern is that your move to vie is inching closer my way'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A VIE - BUD, F TRI - ALB, F GRE - AEG, A BUD - SER, A SER - GRE. Should I trust GERMANY?
